io.micronaut.context

Class ProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.context.ProviderFactory

  • @Internal
public class ProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to convert provider instances to the requested provider type. Internal usage only.
    Since:
    2.4.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
